# PIXI.js Coding Skill

This skill defines best practices for writing GLSL code within Pixi.js projects.

## GLSL in Pixi.js v8

- https://pixijs.download/release/docs/filters.html#creating-custom-filters
- https://pixijs.download/release/docs/rendering.RenderTexture.html#from
- https://pixijs.com/8.x/examples?example=filters_custom_interactive_blending
- https://pixijs.com/8.x/examples?example=mesh_shared-shader
- https://pixijs.com/8.x/guides/migrations/v8#shader-changes
